title: Roulette
desc:
Post 67
- Secretly, this shell chooses a player at random as it is loaded into the shotgun.
- If you manage to shoot this at the same player that it chose, then:
 - Deal 2 damage if you target an opponent.
 - Heal 1 <:charge:1240849067362488403> and gain 1 <:ghost_charge:1240975548331720734> if you target yourself.
- If you try to shoot this at a player other than what it chose, you take 1 damage instead.
